text: Hagi zamagra zamagu'amo'a hankavetige'za keontahi vahe mani'naze. Ana vahera ke huhaviza hu'za vahera ke nezamasaza vahe mani'naze. Ana hu'nazanki'za zamagra vahe'ma zamazeri haviza huke hu'za vano nehazanki'za bronsimo'ene ainimoke'ma hankavema tiankna huno antahintahizmimo'a hankaveti'nea vahe mani'naze. Ana hu'nazanki'za maka kefo avu'avazanke nehaza vahe mani'naze.
